00065 void cleanup(int ret)
00066 {
00067   // stop all mpi clients
00068 
00069 #ifdef MPI
00070   int task=TASKFIN;
00071   BroadcastTask(&task);
00072 
00073   MPI_Finalize();
00074 #endif
00075  
00076   // terminate program with return code
00077   exit(ret);
00078 }

00332     Const[nconst] = ConstraintNO2;
00333     Const[nconst].val = constnoval;
00334     nconst++;
00335   }
00336   if (constbeta) {
00337     Const[nconst] = ConstraintQ2;
00338     Const[nconst].val = sqrt(24*M_PI/5)*constbval;
00339     nconst++;
00340   }
00341   if (constgamma) {
00342     if (!constbeta) {
00343       fprintf(stderr, "gamma constraint only in combination with beta constraint\n");
00344       exit(-1);
00345     }
00346     Const[nconst] = ConstraintDetQ;
00347     Const[nconst].val = sqrt(4*M_PI/5)*constbval*cbrt(2*cos(3*constgval*M_PI/180));
00348     nconst++;
00349   }
00350 
00351   char* interactionfile = argv[optind];
00352   char* parafile = argv[optind+1];
00353 
00354   Interaction Int;
00355   if (readInteractionfromFile(&Int, interactionfile))
00356     cleanup(-1);
00357   Int.cm = cm;
00358 
00359   Parameterization P;
00360   Para qinitial;
00361   if (readParafromFile(&P, &qinitial, parafile))
00362     cleanup(-1);
00363 
00364   SlaterDet Q;
00365   SlaterDetAux X;
00366 
00367   P.ParainitSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00368   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00369   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&qinitial, &Q);
00370 
00371 #ifdef MPI
00372   int task=TASKSTART;
00373   BroadcastTask(&task);
00374 
00375   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00376   BroadcastA(&Q.A);
00377 #endif
00378 
00379   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00380   double einitial;
00381   calcHamiltonian(&Int, &Q, &X, &einitial); 
00382 
00383   int i;
00384   for (i=0; i<nconst; i++)
00385     fprintf(stderr, "# constraining %4s to %8.3f\n", 
00386             Const[i].label, Const[i].output(Const[i].val)); 
00387 
00388   fprintf(stderr, "\ninitial:\tE = %8.3f MeV\n\n", hbc*einitial);
00389 
00390 
00391   Para q;
00392   P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00393 
00394   // shaking the parameters ?
00395   if (shakemag)
00396     shakePara(&q, shakemag);
00397 
00398   // in FMD parameterization move SlaterDet to origin in phase space
00399   if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD")) {
00400     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00401     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00402     SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00403   }
00404 
00405   // minimize !
00406   MinimizeDONLP2(&Int, Const, nconst, &P, &q, maxsteps, log, parafile); 
00407 
00408   double e;
00409   P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00410 
00411   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00412   calcHamiltonian(&Int, &Q, &X, &e);
00413 
00414   fprintf(stderr, "\nfinal:  \tE = %8.3f MeV\n\n", hbc*e);
00415 
00416   // output files
00417 
00418   // backup of parafile
00419 
00420   backup(parafile);
00421 
00422   // save minimization result in MIN directory
00423   {
00424     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00425 
00426     // orient SlaterDet
00427     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00428 
00429     // normalize SlaterDet
00430     normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00431 
00432     // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00433     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00434       SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00435 
00436     // calculate the observables
00437     Observables Obs;
00438   
00439     calcObservables(&Int, &Q, &Obs);
00440 
00441     ensuredir("MIN");
00442     char outfile[1024];
00443     sprintf(outfile, "MIN/%s-min.%d", parafile, (int) time(NULL));
00444 
00445     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", outfile);
00446 
00447     FILE* outfp;
00448     if (!(outfp = fopen(outfile, "w"))) {
00449       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", outfile);
00450       cleanup(-1);
00451     }
00452 
00453     fprintinfo(outfp);
00454 
00455     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00456             "# using %s interaction\n", 
00457             cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, Int.name);
00458   
00459     fprintf(outfp, "# einitial: %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*einitial);
00460     fprintf(outfp, "# efinal:   %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00461 
00462     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00463 
00464     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00465     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00466     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00467  
00468     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00469     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00470 
00471     fclose(outfp);  
00472   }
00473 
00474   // save minimization result in parafile
00475   {
00476     // no improvement ? then write initial parameters
00477     if (!overwrite && einitial < e) 
00478       P.Paraclone(&qinitial, &q);
00479 
00480     P.ParatoSlaterDet(&q, &Q);
00481 
00482     // orient SlaterDet
00483     moveboostorientSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00484 
00485     // normalize SlaterDet
00486     normalizeSlaterDet(&Q, &X);
00487 
00488     // in FMD parameterization we copy the relocated SlaterDet
00489     if (!strcmp(P.name, "FMD"))
00490       SlaterDetinitFMD(&Q, &q);
00491 
00492     // calculate the observables
00493     Observables Obs;
00494   
00495     calcObservables(&Int, &Q, &Obs);
00496 
00497     fprintf(stderr, "... writing Parameters to file %s\n", parafile);
00498 
00499     FILE* outfp;
00500     if (!(outfp = fopen(parafile, "w"))) {
00501       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", parafile);
00502       cleanup(-1);
00503     }
00504 
00505     fprintinfo(outfp);
00506 
00507     fprintf(outfp, "\n# minimized %s for %s in %s parameterization\n"
00508             "# using %s interaction\n", 
00509             cm ? "< Hintr >" : "< H >", q.name, P.name, Int.name);
00510   
00511     fprintf(outfp, "\n# einitial: %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*einitial);
00512     fprintf(outfp, "# efinal:   %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*e);
00513 
00514     if (overwrite)
00515       fprintf(outfp, "\n# overwrite flag: use new parameters\n\n");
00516     if (!overwrite && einitial < e)
00517       fprintf(outfp, "\n# no improvement by minimization: use initial parameters\n\n");
00518 
00519     fprintObservables(outfp, &Int, &Q, &Obs);
00520 
00521     fprintf(outfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00522     fprintf(outfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", P.name);
00523     P.Parawrite(outfp, &q);
00524  
00525     fprintf(outfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00526     writeSlaterDet(outfp, &Q);
00527 
00528     fclose(outfp);  
00529   }
00530 
00531   fprintf(stderr, "... %4.2f minutes computing time used\n", usertime()/60.0);
00532 
00533   cleanup(0);

00536   }
